programme.desc: A woman has a sexual relationship with her son's friend a girl's life becomes hell after sharing a naked photo of herself.

programme.title: Scared Silent
programme.desc: Several women (Penelope Ann Miller, Liisa Repo-Martell) who were raped by a police officer band together to bring their assailant to justice.

programme.title: Stronger
programme.desc: Jeff Bauman loses both of his legs when two bombs explode during the Boston Marathon on April 15, 2013. After regaining consciousness in the hospital, Jeff is able to help law enforcement identify one of the suspects, but his own battle is just beginning. With unwavering support from his family and girlfriend, Bauman embarks on a long and heroic journey to physical and emotional rehabilitation.

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: Sonny Weaver Jr. is the general manager of the Cleveland Browns. One of pro football's most important days, NFL draft day, is drawing near, but Sonny has much more on his mind than just which players to recruit. His lover is pregnant, and the team's owner wants to fire him. After Sonny accepts a deal with Seattle that nets him that team's first-round pick, he immediately wonders if he has made the right choice for himself and the Browns.

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Gov. George W. Bush of Texas picks Dick Cheney, the CEO of Halliburton Co., to be his Republican running mate in the 2000 presidential election. No stranger to politics, Cheney's impressive résumé includes stints as White House chief of staff, House Minority Whip and defense secretary. When Bush wins by a narrow margin, Cheney begins to use his newfound power to help reshape the country and the world.

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Flashbacks to key events in his life reveal the rise of George W. Bush from ne'er-do-well party boy and son of privilege to president of the United States. After trading in booze for religion, George mends his aimless ways and sets his sights first on the Texas governorship, then on the presidency. But the country's involvement in the Iraq war decreases his approval rating.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Vincent Vega (John Travolta) and Jules Winnfield (Samuel L. Jackson) are hitmen with a penchant for philosophical discussions. In this ultra-hip, multi-strand crime movie, their storyline is interwoven with those of their boss, gangster Marsellus Wallace (Ving Rhames) his actress wife, Mia (Uma Thurman) struggling boxer Butch Coolidge (Bruce Willis) master fixer Winston Wolfe (Harvey Keitel) and a nervous pair of armed robbers, "Pumpkin" (Tim Roth) and "Honey Bunny" (Amanda Plummer).

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Slow-witted Forrest Gump (Tom Hanks) has never thought of himself as disadvantaged, and thanks to his supportive mother (Sally Field), he leads anything but a restricted life. Whether dominating on the gridiron as a college football star, fighting in Vietnam or captaining a shrimp boat, Forrest inspires people with his childlike optimism. But one person Forrest cares about most may be the most difficult to save -- his childhood love, the sweet but troubled Jenny (Robin Wright).

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In need of a vacation from his ordinary life, factory worker Douglas Quaid (Colin Farrell) visits Rekall, a company that can turn dreams into real memories. Thinking that memories of life as a superspy are just the ticket, Quaid undergoes the procedure -- but it goes horribly wrong. Suddenly, Quaid is a hunted man. He teams up with a rebel fighter (Jessica Biel) on a search to find the head of the underground resistance and take down the leader (Bryan Cranston) of the free world.

programme.title: Premium Rush
programme.desc: For bike messenger Wilee (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), dodging speeding cars, evading crazy cabdrivers, and blowing by millions of cranky pedestrians is all in a day's work. Wilee is one of the best in a dangerous job, and his bike of choice is a Fixie, a lightweight, single-gear unit without brakes. Though Wilee knows that one day he may end up as a smear on the pavement -- he is unprepared for what happens after his last run of the day turns into a life-or-death chase through Manhattan.

programme.title: The Lazarus Project
programme.desc: A death-row inmate (Paul Walker) searches for the truth after he mysteriously awakes in a psychiatric hospital.

programme.title: In the Cloud
programme.desc: Using a VR environment to pinpoint the location of bombs, two geniuses invade terrorists' memories. But hiding in the shadows are those with secret agendas who seek to utilize the memory cloud for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: A Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: City officials evacuate the capital of Arizona once they realize an astronomer (Richard Crenna) was right about a comet.

programme.title: Harriet Craig
programme.desc: Harriet Craig (Joan Crawford) enjoys the married life but constantly tries to control those around her. She does not trust her husband, Walter (Wendell Corey), without checking up on him. When he is offered a promotion that will require traveling, Harriet tells his boss that Walter has a gambling problem. She also sabotages a budding relationship between her cousin Clare and Wes Miller, Walter's assistant. However, Walter discovers Harriet's interference, which leads to a confrontation.

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: When the tiny nation of Grand Fenwick's only export, a special wine, begins to be produced in California, their entire economy collapses. Things look dire until Prime Minister Rupert Mountjoy (Peter Sellers) points out that no country that has declared war on the United States has ever gone hungry. When Field Marshall Tully Bascombe (Peter Sellers) and the 23 other men in the Grand Fenwick army invade the United States, their plan to immediately surrender unravels.

programme.title: The Guilt of Janet Ames
programme.desc: War widow Janet Ames (Rosalind Russell) is struck by a car, and later her doctors suspect she may have been attempting suicide. A note in her pocket lists five men whom her husband died saving in battle, and they are contacted to help Janet's recovery. The first man on the list, jaded reporter Smitty Cobb (Melvyn Douglas), is offended when Janet says she hopes to prove her husband died in vain to save five worthless men, and offers to "introduce" Janet to each of the men through hypnotism.

programme.title: Where Angels Go, Trouble Follows
programme.desc: In this uproarious comedy, tradition faces off against modernity when a young, hip nun, Sister George (Stella Stevens), challenges the ideas of her conservative Mother Superior (Rosalind Russell). Though the two nuns think they will never see eye to eye, a bus trip across the country -- during which they encounter many wacky characters, including a movie producer (Milton Berle) and a millionaire (Robert Taylor) -- helps them find some common ground.

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Discovered by businessman Tim Daland, Cole is teamed with legendary crew chief and car-builder Harry Hogge to race for the Winston Cup at the Daytona 500. A crash nearly ends Cole's career and he must turn to a beautiful doctor to regain his nerve.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee
programme.desc: Michael J. Crocodile Dundee is a free-spirited Australian who hunts crocodiles with his bare hands, stares down giant water buffaloes, and drinks mere mortals under the table.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Gentle farmer Arthur Hoggett (James Cromwell) wins a piglet named Babe (Christine Cavanaugh) at a county fair. Narrowly escaping his fate as Christmas dinner when Farmer Hoggett decides to show him at the next fair, Babe bonds with motherly border collie Fly (Miriam Margolyes) and discovers that he too can herd sheep. But will the other farm animals, including Fly's jealous husband Rex, accept a pig who doesn't conform to the farm's social hierarchy?

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: When Babe accidentally puts farmer Hoggett (James Cromwell) in traction, the debtors come looking for their payments. In order to pay their debt, Mrs. Hoggett (Magda Szubanski) sends Babe off across the ocean to the city to demonstrate his talents as a sheep herder. Along with his friends, Babe meets a lot of new friends and gets into new adventures.

programme.title: R. L. Stine's The Haunting Hour: Don't Think About It
programme.desc: A girl (Emily Osment) and her brother (Alex Winzenread) have spooky encounters when one of them reads the lines of a mysterious book.

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: A treasure hunter (Jackie Chan) and his team set out on a global quest to find a set of Chinese zodiac bronze heads that were stolen from a Beijing palace in the 19th century.

programme.title: Santa Girl
programme.desc: Santa Claus� only daughter wants to experience the �real world� before she must marry the son of Jack Frost and take over the family business. Cassie Claus sets off to college while trying to keep her famous father a secret.

programme.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ruby (Jamie Chung) and Josh (Bryan Greenberg) spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance.

programme.title: The Longest Week
programme.desc: When Conrad is kicked out and cut off at the age of forty, he crashes with his only friend and falls in love with his friend�s girlfriend

programme.title: I'll Be Homeless For Christmas
programme.desc: When a petty thief learns that his latest mark is a struggling single mother who works at a homeless shelter, he decides to use his savvy street smarts to make this Christmas one to remember for her and her young son.

programme.title: My Dad's Christmas Date
programme.desc: A 16-year-old tries to play matchmaker for her widowed father during Christmastime.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone

programme.title: Corrupt
programme.desc: A district attorney asks a forensic accountant (Nicole de Boer) to investigate the murder of a key witness.

programme.title: Amber's Story
programme.desc: The true story of the kidnapping of Amber Hagerman and how her family came together to help abducted children

programme.title: The Virginian
programme.desc: After his parents are killed a boy is raised by a powerful cattle baron to uphold the "code of the west".

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: A con artist and her daughter target a rich family's hidden treasure—but the heist takes unexpected turns.

programme.title: An Affair
programme.desc: So-hyun's quiet life is shaken when she falls for her sister's young fiancé. Will she risk her family for him?

programme.title: Young Adult Matters
programme.desc: Se-jin, an 18-year-old girl, faces a series of tragedies in her life. From crises regarding relationships to family upheaval, the young girl gets through them with the support from a new friend Ju-young and two other runaway teenagers like herself. Together they try to terminate Se-jin's unwanted pregnancy, but it's not an easy mission for destitute teenagers stuck between childhood and adulthood.

programme.title: On Your Wedding Day
programme.desc: Woo-Yeon and Seung-Hee pretend to date to avoid troubles from others. Will the relationship develop?

programme.title: Troublesome
programme.desc: Veteran homicide detective Michael reluctantly partners with rookie Derrick. Witnessing a double homicide, they survive a deadly chase, but Derrick is wounded. The suspects are linked to the kingpin, who retaliates by ordering murders across the city. As chaos erupts, the FBI joins the case, revealing the kingpin's identity. Michael finds a weak link, offering a chance to finally catch him.

programme.title: All the love
programme.desc: A young woman begins her journey to adulthood, navigating love and self-discovery, while being haunted by a mysterious past that she can't fully remember. As murders and violence swirl around her, she wonders who she can trust. Will she find love or suffer the same mysterious fate as her birth parents?

programme.title: Crush
programme.desc: Haunted by her past, a young woman's life is complicated by love, self-discovery, and surrounding violence.

programme.title: The Good Sister
programme.desc: Raven moves in with her sister Devin and her husband in Atlanta, where she begins to dig her claws into Devin's life and home, and seducing her husband. Devin must make a choice that could be deadly to save her own life and happiness.

programme.title: She Thought
programme.desc: Sexy bombshell Markisha uses her body to land whatever man she thinks will spoil her with love and money, even if it means betraying her own family, but she eventually realizes that the grass isn't so green on the other side.

programme.title: Legend of the Golden Gun
programme.desc: An Old West gunfighter (Hal Holbrook) turns a young farmer (Jeff Osterhage) into a justice fighter with a special gun.

programme.title: Face of a Fugitive
programme.desc: While being escorted to jail, bank robber Jim Larson (Fred MacMurray) manages to get the upper hand on his captor and escape. Jim is surprised to see his brother appear on the scene, ready to aid his sibling. As they make their getaway, his brother and the pursuing lawman shoot each other, leaving the stunned Jim alone and on the run. Assuming a different identity, Jim travels to a mining town and befriends the local sheriff (Lin McCarthy), hoping to start over and find redemption.

programme.title: The Hellions
programme.desc: A small-town policeman (Richard Todd) stands alone against a family of outlaws in 19th-century South Africa.

programme.title: Comanche Station
programme.desc: When solitary cowboy Jefferson Cody (Randolph Scott) hears tales of a white woman living as a captive of the Comanche tribe, he rides deep into the tribe's territory to exchange goods for her freedom. As Cody escorts the captive woman away, he learns that she is Nancy Lowe (Nancy Gates), and that there is a sizable reward offered by her husband for her return. Cody and Mrs. Lowe must brave ruthless bounty hunters greedy for the reward, as well as the now-warring Comanches, to make it to safety.

programme.title: Cripple Creek
programme.desc: A federal agent (George Montgomery) and two colleagues infiltrate a gang of gold-rush gold smugglers.

programme.title: Along Came Jones
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Doc, Hands of Steel
programme.desc: After taking on a murdered sheriff's identity and a bandit gang vows to kill him, Doc turns for help to the bounty hunter tracking him.

programme.desc: Wells Fargo hires bounty hunters to protect its gold transports from notorious outlaw Glenn Kovacs. Hired gunman Jeff Sullivan buys the freedom of Dan Barker, a prisoner who may lead him to Kovacs, but Barker escapes.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter in Trinity
programme.desc: Townsfolk hire a bounty hunter to protect them from a band of Mexican outlaws.

programme.title: Against a Crooked Sky
programme.desc: When the eldest daughter of a family of settlers is captured by an American Indian warrior, her brother, Sam Sutter (Stewart Petersen), sets out to rescue her. Along the way, he encounters a wise, but alcoholic trapper named Russian (Richard Boone) who agrees to help him. The pair's journey into the remote Red Rock region of Utah is a perilous one, which ultimately brings them face to face with Chief Cut Tongue (Henry Wilcoxon), whose solution to the situation is a treacherous one.

programme.title: Dead Are Countless
programme.desc: As a small boy, Johnny sees his father killed by soldiers. Years later, he grows up to be an outlaw and kills soldiers whenever he can.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark is kidnapped and held for ransom, he finds himself an unwilling companion of gunman Carl Avery.

programme.desc: Lucas seeks an escape when he's captured by outlaws while seeking help for an injured Mark.

programme.desc: The young Queen-to-be of France hides out in North Fork with her sick brother.

programme.desc: Lucas's old Army pal settles in North Fork with his deaf daughter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An Englishman arrives with a custom-made rifle and a plan to kill Lucas.

programme.desc: A handsome gambler moves into town and begins wooing Milly Scott, claiming to have known her deceased brother.

programme.desc: Mark and Milly are shocked when Lucas begins gambling. They don't know that Lucas is "undercover" trying to catch a man cheating.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark befriends singer-banjoist Lafayette Bly, a blind man with an acute sense of hearing and a very strong grip.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: No one is more surprised than Micah when newcomer Leota Carraway claims he's her long-lost husband and the father of her child.

programme.title: Jeremiah Johnson
programme.desc: A Mexican-American War veteran, Jeremiah Johnson (Robert Redford), heads to the mountains to live in isolation. Woefully unequipped for the task at hand, Johnson is fortunate to come across a seasoned mountain man (Will Geer) willing to teach him the necessary survival tactics. As life continues in the mountains, Johnson finds himself a native bride (Delle Bolton) and an adopted son (Josh Albee). However, their peaceful existence is threatened when Johnson incurs the ire of the Crow Indians.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: Gunmen pit homesteaders against cattlemen.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The Lone Ranger and Tonto seek stage robbers.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: A minister wants to build an orphanage on copper-bearing land.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: A woman's life is endangered after she testifies at a murder trial.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: A Mexican bandit holds Dan Reid captive in a cave.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: Sabotage and attempted murder play a part in the sale of a ranch.

programme.title: Frontier Marshal
programme.desc: In the frontier town of Tombstone, Arizona, the charismatic Wyatt Earp (Randolph Scott) is a pistol-toting sheriff who earns the respect of almost everyone he encounters. John "Doc" Halliday (Cesar Romero), however, poses an unusual challenge to the lawman when he flouts local rules with his illegal business ventures. But the sheriff finds himself acting on Halliday's behalf when the latter is slain, leading to the famed gun battle at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Death Valley Days

programme.desc: An Army lieutenant's troops fly a red petticoat as their standard while warring with Indians.

programme.desc: Mary Kileen, a woman who likes to see men die for her.

programme.desc: Maj. Galloway heads a group of Army scouts.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.desc: Gambler Bill Gentry must give up his habit in order to marry a woman.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.desc: Two thieves cause trouble after they overhear a conversation between a couple of businessmen.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.desc: The victim of an armed robbery dies before positively identifying the culprit, leading to a question of mistaken identity in the trial of a man who claims innocence despite resembling the killer.

programme.title: Death Valley Days
programme.desc: Two outlaws set upon Maggie Woolf and her father who are taking refuge from a storm in an abandoned cabin.

programme.title: Hills of Utah
programme.desc: Gene Autry (Gene Autry) is the new doctor in a rough frontier town torn apart by a feud between the area's miners and cattle ranchers. When he's not caring for his patients, Autry searches for the mysterious stranger who killed his father. He comes to the rescue of Karen McQueen (Elaine Riley) and tries to save her baby brother, but soon finds himself framed for murder. With the help of his friend Dusty Cosgrove (Pat Buttram), Autry sets out to clear his name and stop the fighting.

programme.title: The Big Show
programme.desc: Arrogant film star Tom Ford (Gene Autry) goes AWOL before a high-profile personal appearance at the Texas Centennial Exposition in Dallas. In a panic, publicist Lee Wilson (William Newell) instructs Ford's screen double, kindhearted cowboy Gene Autry (also Autry), to go on in Ford's place. Gangster Rico (Harry Worth), to whom Ford owes $10,000, and Ford's fiancée, Toodles (Sally Payne), complicate the deception, as does Gene's budding romance with lady rancher Marion (Kay Hughes).

programme.title: Greaser's Palace
programme.desc: Cult writer-director Robert Downey's surreal, scatological parable of the life of Christ takes place in a rundown Wild West town run by the perpetually angry and severely constipated Seaweedhead Greaser (Albert Henderson). When Seaweedhead accuses his son, Lamy (Michael Sullivan), of homosexuality and kills him, mysterious stranger Jessy (Allan Arbus) raises the son from the dead. Meanwhile, an unnamed woman (Elsie Downey) struggles to reach the town after her husband and son are murdered.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: An Old West poker player (Kenny Rogers) acquires a sidekick (Bruce Boxleitner) and sets out to help the son he never knew.

programme.title: The Shooting

The group embarks on the journey and is eventually joined by Billy Spear (Jack Nicholson), a volatile gunslinger the woman has also hired. The only question is why.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: They call Key West the Conch Republic, but this quirky little island has some of the best seafood around. Sara's there to cook with Norman Van Aken who put Key West food on the map. First up, a spicy Bahamian Soup followed by the Key West version of a pot luck, the ‘Cut up' Salad. On Ask Sara, tricks for cutting Avocados and Cherry Tomatoes.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: The simplest weeknight meal starts with two pieces of bread and today Sara's got takes on two American favorites. First, she joins a beekeeper in Savannah, Georgia to make a Rosemary Honey and Georgia Peach Chutney Burger. Next, midwestern Kielbasa Sandwiches get an added kick with Kimchee and Cheddar Cheese.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Chicken is a weeknight staple and we've got three amazing ways to prepare it. First, Sara goes to Charleston, South Carolina to learn the secrets behind a local favorite – Martha Lou's Fried Chicken. Then, Sara's got a killer recipe for White Chicken Chili. And on Ask Sara, an easy way to flatten chicken breasts.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Sara tours the South for some mouthwatering favorites, starting in the Church Tea Rooms of Charleston, South Carolina, where every spring parishioners serve local favorites like She Crab Soup, Huguenot Torte and Pimento Cheese Sandwiches. Then it's off to the Louisiana Bayou where Sara catches some crawfish with a local Cajun, then joins him to cook a delicious Crawfish Etouffee served at a big local party.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: The unique food of New Orleans is on the menu with two spectacular preparations. Sara's contribution is a Blackened fish with Creole spice and zucchini. Then, a history of how African American foods have permeated our culture and our cooking. Finally, New Orleans chef Airis Johnson makes a Jambalaya Sara says is the best she's ever tasted.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Snack your way through dinner with these delicious small bites from all over the world. Sara starts at the birthplace of appetizers for dinner – Catalonia, Spain. There she tastes the famous jamon with a local chef, who teaches her two quick tapas – a Spanish omelet and simple Bread with Tomatoes.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Viewers love five ingredient meals and Sara delivers with three simple and tasty recipes from the land and from the sea. First, Sara recalls her years working with Julia Child with one of Julia's favorite French dishes - a simple Fish Meuniere. Later Sara's brother joins her for a manly steak slathered in a special flavored butter, and then a New England summer favorite, peas and Salmon, but with the crispy skin you see at high end restaurants. On Ask Sara – a viewer learns a foolproof way to poach eggs.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Good for you and good for the planet, vegetarian food will have even more converts once they taste the hearty and flavorful food Sara's got in this episode, starting with a recipe by vegan cook Adam Sobel. He makes Korean Barbecue Tacos with a satisfying kick of heat. Sara's got a new quick way to cook spaghetti squash and then she smashes any notion it's bland with a with a creamy goat cheese sauce.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: If you're a secret porkatarian then this is the show for you. Wok guru Grace Young joins us with a Chinese Barbecued Pork that's as sweet as candy and highly addictive. If there's any leftover, you'll want to try it in her Yangchow Fried Rice – that's a meal! Later Sara's got another tasty grilled pork dish served with a surprising melon and cucumber salsa.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: No need to sweat when company comes if you follow Sara's simple recipes. Everyone will be talking about the Japanese Beef Fondue where guests cook their own meats and veggies in a flavorful broth. Sara shows a viewer an easy hack to flatten chicken breasts on Ask Sara. For dessert, a make ahead Skillet Apple Pie.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: On a cold night there is nothing more satisfying than a warm and hearty casserole. Sara's got a winner with her baked penne with prosciutto and gooey fontina because each person gets their own mini casserole. Another slam dunk – a filling chicken cassoulet. Sara's buddy Ming Tsai has his own version of that French classic, this one with duck spiked with ginger and orange.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Come summer there is nothing so tasty as grilled meat or fish nestled in a buttery bun. Sara's got three great choices starting with a poor man's version of the New England lobster roll, with shrimp taking the starring role on a budget. A turkey burger is made succulent and juicy with the addition of spinach, and finally, pork sliders filled with chopped veggies for flavor, crunch and moisture. Meat on a bun, and bring on the sun.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: It's a stuffed pasta showdown as Sara travels to an ancient Tuscan villa to learn the secrets of homemade ravioli from a real Italian chef, a delicious but time-consuming task involving asparagus, goat cheese and a whole lot of chianti. Back home in her American kitchen, Sara shows us a hack to make a homemade ravioli stuffed with spicy greens, quick enough for a weeknight and pretty darn tasty. Which is best? Only the cook knows.

programme.desc: Chef Dale is flipping burgers into art - gooey mac & cheese burgers, fancy French patties topped with melty bucheron cheese, crispy parm-truffle fries, and peanut butter fudge ice cream sandwiches. Get hungry.

programme.title: Spring Thunder

Florida Osceola turkeys are first on the list. Then, onward. Follow along as they tackle this grand challenge.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Last summer Cam Rhoden and his family were told that he may never breath on his own again, much less walk. After meeting David Blanton during his rehab at the Shepherd Center, they made plans to go on a Georgia turkey hunt. Cam is not only walking - he's walking to a Georgia Gobbler!

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: We set out to tell the tale of Marion - and his legendary Mack's Prairie Wings, smack dab in the middle of the world famous Stuttgart, Arkansas - the land of ducks and rice. Get an inside look at a man that many consider to be larger than life, from those that knew him best, like his cousin and fellow hell raiser, Bud McCollum. We'll even hear a story or two from Milton Stovesand, an 81 year old former waterfowl guide and Mack's employee who actually guided John Olin a time or two, and ran the timber holes with Marion. It's timber holes and tall tales. It's cups of coffee and cupped up wings. It's partners in business, and partners in potholes and it's pure Arkansas...just like Marion.

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: We head back to North Dakota for our annual hunting trip and have a few really good days!

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Zach heads back to the homeland to chase ducks and geese in the prairie potholes.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Texas is the home to many exotic species that can be hunted. One species in particular, Axis, have a very large population. Our team got together and had a great time hanging out with a land owner and hunting Axis deer.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.sub-title: Storytellers - "Trinity Oaks - Bucks for the Brave
programme.desc: We are blessed for the opportunity to follow along the guys from Trinity Oaks for Bucks for the Brave. The men and women that served in our armed services and as first responders, had jobs that required the, to be willing to sacrifice their own lives every day, in order to protect or save someone else's. Not many of us can say that, nor understand what that truly means. The things they've had to see, and the sacrifices they've made in their daily lives, can have a profound impact on them. Trinity Oaks' Bucks for the Brave platform allows the loved ones and communities that support these heroes to share their stories and unite us all in honoring and recognizing their service to our great nation. We are proud to continue to be a part of this incredible program, getting these heroes in the outdoors for the hunt of a lifetime.

programme.title: Spring Thunder
programme.sub-title: Spring Thunder - "Tagging a Spooked Gobby | Right Over the Shoulder | Spring Thunder
programme.desc: Phillip Culpepper and Drake Lamb head to Mississippi to hunt with good friend, Perry Ross. Jarrod Nichols from Bushnell and Jesse Highling from Retay are in camp. Nichols has one heck of a hunt that ends with a longbeard gobbling at 20 yards. It's go time.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: On this weeks episode of Hunting Land Man, Slade and his daughter Asa take on the turkey woods together for the first time. As this is Asa's first time turkey hunting some quick pre hunt preparations are in order. Slade also was able to sit down with a good friend and registered forester to talk fire and the benefits of fire in land management. The next day, Asa and Slade were able to connect with a thundering tom as Asa punched her first ever turkey tag!

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
programme.desc: Lt. Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen) returns for more madcap high jinks in this police-procedural spoof. Powerful energy corporations are intent on putting a halt to the eco-friendly plans of Dr. Albert S. Meinheimer (Richard Griffiths), the new U.S. energy czar. They scheme to replace Meinheimer with an imposter who will do their bidding. Unfortunately for them, Drebin gets tangled up with their plans while trying to steal back his ex (Priscilla Presley) from her slimy new beau (Robert Goulet).

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: Police Squad Lt. Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen) is retired and spending time with his new wife, Jane (Priscilla Presley), when he's called back into action by Capt. Ed Hocken (George Kennedy). A terrorist named Rocco (Fred Ward) plans to bomb the Academy Awards ceremony, so Frank goes undercover as Phil Donahue to try and head off disaster. He causes almost as much trouble as he prevents in an Oscar show complete with over-the-top production numbers and numerous celebrity appearances.

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: Defying the very notion of good taste, Scary Movie out-parodies the pop culture parodies with a no-holds barred assault on the most popular images and talked-about moments from recent films, television and commercials. The film boldly fires barbs at the classic scenes from "Scream," "The Sixth Sense," "The Matrix," "I Know What You Did Last Summer" and "The Blair Witch Project," then goes on to mock a whole myriad of teen movie clichés, no matter the genre.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2
programme.desc: As the supernatural extension of the first film, Scary Movie 2 casts its satirical eye on such iconic classics as The Exorcist and Poltergeist, as well as the more recent films Hannibal, What Lies Beneath and The House on Haunted Hill. In addition to all things supernatural, it lunges even further, taking on pulp icons including Charlie's Angels and Mission Impossible 2.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: After his childhood buddy is murdered while visiting Detroit, rebellious cop Axel Foley (Eddie Murphy) follows the leads to Beverly Hills, Calif., under the auspices of a vacation. He checks in with old friend Jenny Summers (Lisa Eilbacher) and starts to believe her boss, art dealer Victor Maitland (Steven Berkoff), might somehow be involved in the murder. However, Lt. Bogomil (Ronny Cox) of the Beverly Hills Police Department does not trust Foley, and hinders his search for evidence.

programme.title: Aaron Woodull
programme.desc: Adored by girlfriends' mothers everywhere, Aaron Woodall is a nice, young man coming to grips with a dirty, cynical world. Whether it be the lack of car horns for polite people, or the horrors of childbirth, or the disappointing reality of true love, Aaron always shares his disillusions with a sense of with wide-eyed excitement.His unique perspective has been entertaining sold-out comedy clubs and half-empty bars across the West for the last four years. In 2015, Aaron made his national television debut when he performed on "Laughs" on FOX, and this year he can be seen hosting the new hidden camera pranks show "Random Acts" on BYUtv.

programme.title: Byron Trimble
programme.sub-title: Diary of a Short City Boy
programme.desc: Byron Trimble has traveled around the world doing comedy for conferences, churches, retreats, clubs, schools, and corporate events. He has been featured on NBC, ABC, Living Oklahoma, and the Dan Patrick Show. His hilarious blend of music and comedy in his live shows and the following generated by his online videos have enabled him to share the stage with nationally known comedians like John Crist and Anita Renfroe. Raised in Detroit, MI, he now lives in Tulsa, OK with his beautiful wife, Hannah, and three young children. Yet, he says his greatest success might be being a pastors kid his whole life and never being arrested.

programme.title: Derrick Tennant: Love Wastefully

programme.title: James Johann
programme.desc: James' childhood upbringing was significantly influenced by country music, countless bad hair cuts, and Catholic school. In 1991, James began his stand-up career in Kansas City. Today, James is a long-time veteran of the stand-up comedy circuit, performing at clubs across the country. His self-deprecating sense of humor and high energy style come together to create a unique onstage persona. James relies more on his brain than the profane and his comedy is a truthful and hilarious reflection of life as he sees it.

programme.title: Dan St. Paul
programme.desc: Thirty year comedy veteran Dan St. Paul jokes about acting his age, his Italian heritage, and slowly becoming a cylinder the older he gets.

programme.title: Card Sharks
programme.desc: This show from legendary Mark Goodson-Bill Todman Productions features two contestants trying to predict answers to survey questions for the opportunity to play a game with oversized playing cards for a chance to win cash. One contestant guesses how many people (out of 100) gave a certain answer to a question and the other contestant then guesses if the number is higher or lower than the opponent's guess. The winning contestant then faces a row of cards and must determine if each succeeding card is higher or lower than the one that precedes it. The contestant who wins two out of three games wins the match and plays the bonus round, called Money Cards. The Money Cards round is similar to the card game in the main game but with three levels of cards instead of one row. The contestant is given $200 at the beginning of Money Cards and wagers any or all of that money when guessing if the cards will be higher or lower than the previous one. A perfect round could earn the contestant $28,800.

His life changes when an Italian mob boss, Don Falcone (Roy Scheider), asks him to kill Mona Demarkov (Lena Olin), a Russian assassin. But Mona escapes from Jack's grasp at every opportunity, leaving him to face dire consequences, dragging him into a lethal game of cat and mouse and manipulating him into carrying out otherwise unimaginable acts.

programme.title: Memento

The difficulty, however, of locating his wife's killer is compounded by the fact that he suffers from a rare, untreatable form of memory loss. Although he can recall details of life before his accident, Leonard cannot remember what happened fifteen minutes ago, where he's going, or why.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints

As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community. But Paul Smecker (Willem Dafoe), an eccentric FBI agent, is fast closing in on their blood-soaked trail.

Assigned to write a real-life prostitution exposé, he fails to gain information from his subjects and decides to make up his own story about a pimp. programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Meet fascinating creatures from across the globe and learn to run, hop, and crawl like your favorite animal friends. Dance and sing along to discover animal names and the native habitats of the world's most unique creatures. See real-life images of lions and zebras on the African savannah, then learn animal names through repetition and narration, or simply watch your favorite animals play!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Share a rainbow of sights and sounds with your baby as you discover the wonders of color together! Join puppet host "Vincent Van Goat" as he creates six Van Gogh masterpieces exploring red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. World Of Colors is a spirited celebration of creative expression.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Discovering Shapes: Circles, Squares, and More
programme.desc: As babies develop, their understanding of the world, and how its pieces "fit" together, continues to progress. DISCOVERING SHAPES playfully introduces five basic forms circle, oval, triangle, square and rectangle as each appears in the context of toys, nature and everyday objects.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Einstein: Let's Learn About Animals in the Water
programme.desc: Discover the wonderful world of water and deep dive into all the amazing creatures that call the ocean home. Learn simple words about the sea like water, coral reef, and ocean through narration and repetition. Engaging live-action footage of your favorite ocean friends and classical melodies will dazzle your little explorer as they experience the magical world under the sea.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: World Music introduces you and your little one to beautiful sounds from every continent, bringing a fresh, new experience of music and culture. Sing, dance and play to exotic rhythms that open the door to an appreciation of different cultures from around the world.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: From the moment babies are born, they use their developing senses to discover the world. In terms of sight, bold patterns in contrasting colors or black and white are initially preferred. As for sounds, Mother s gentle voice, in any language, is music to baby's ears. Language Nursery: Voices From Many Lands acquaints your baby with the sounds of foreign language by presenting delightful, visually stimulating images accompanied by spoken passages, natural sounds and music.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Let's Explore: Polar Bears, Sea Lions, Whistling Swans and Narwhals
programme.desc: Join the Ocean Explorers crew and learn about polar bears, sea lions, whistling swans, and narwhals! Enjoy real-life footage of these majestic creatures. Discover how to count, learn about your five senses, and see the difference between large and small through narration and repetition. Sing and dance along to Polar Bear Hide n Seek, The Sea Lion Bark, and Let's Build a Nest Together!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby's First Moves: Get Up and Go
programme.desc: Within the first year of babies' lives, their physical development begins to kick into high gear as they explore ways to physically interact with the world around them. BABY'S FIRST MOVES is a joyful celebration of their movement milestones -- including first steps, clapping, jumping, dancing and more.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Take your little explorer on an exotic musical expedition to meet wild animals from across the globe. Journey to the jungle, savannah, desert and forest.

programme.title: Baby Einstein

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: On the Go: Riding, Sailing and Soaring
programme.desc: As little ones become increasingly mobile, their fascination with all things that move intensifies too. On the Go: Riding, Sailing and Soaring exposes babies to the different ways people travel -- on land, by sea, and in the air -- while it presents them with captivating real-world images, funny puppet shows, and beautiful classical music by Beethoven, Haydn, Mozart and Rossini.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: At the girls' campout, Sour launches into a whopper of a yarn about the adventures she and Sweet had in the "Berry Deep Dark Forest." She tries to get Sweet to participate in spinning the tale, but Sour's over-the-top performance leaves Sweet behind. Toward the end, Sour graciously changes the story to pull Sweet into it, giving Sweet the opportunity to toss in an ad lib that makes a nice topper to Sour's story.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Apple's rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberry's new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberry's stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberry's reputation, proclaims it's delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apple's review and orders Strawberry's new cake for her ball.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Berrykin Bloom's braggart cousin, Berrykin Bertram, has won the hot sauce competition at the local county fair year after year.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Apple feels left out of a Berryball game and an advanced ballet class, she invents some "groove booties" programmed to dance to any beat. She temporarily impresses her friends with her dance moves, but when the groove booties go out of control and threaten the town's Berryball game, she is forced to fess up.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When the girls discover that Apple's groove booties can teach the pups to dance, Plum gets an idea for a Doggie Dance Show. Wanting to impress them, Huck offers to have TomTom join the show... despite the pup's obvious dislike of performing in public. It's up to Strawberry to help Huck see that he should not force TomTom into something he just doesn't want to do.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a simple tune Cherry composes goes viral on the Berryweb, Cherry quickly gets fed up with everyone listening to this song, everywhere, all the time. She goes to comic lengths to get some peace so she can compose the song she's suppose to write for the Queen of Berryvania.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: At the next Storytime, Strawberry is going to read a new poem. We see her at the podium as she finishes writing it, one afternoon when no one else is in the café except Custard and Pupcake. Strawberry clears her throat and reads the poem aloud. It's a simple, sweet rhyme about the magic of making wishes on falling stars. She tries a few different rhymes as she goes, noting them on her paper. She is startled to hear applause from Mr. Longface Caterpillar who has heard her recital.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: From the BerryWorks to Strawberry's Café, everyone is excited about who will win this year's Spring Flower Festival! Berry Bitty City is decorated with colorful banners proclaiming the big event. Lemon works the hardest. For weeks she has watered her violets by day and sung to them at night, doing everything she can to win first prize. With the contest just a day away, Lemon is at her garden early.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry and Orange are dangling their legs in the stream when something tickles Orange's foot. She is sent squealing from the water, certain an eel is after her. Strawberry good-naturedly chuckles at her antics. But Orange gets her dander up and wades into the water to face her "attacker." When she looks down into the water, gazing up at her is the cutest, most adorable, puffy-cheeked fish she's ever seen. It's love at first sight. Orange has to take him home.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: From the BerryWorks to Strawberry's Café, everyone is excited about who will win this year's Spring Flower Festival! Berry Bitty City is decorated with colorful banners proclaiming the big event. Lemon works the hardest. For weeks she has watered her violets by day and sung to them at night, doing everything she can to win first prize. With the contest just a day away, Lemon is at her garden early.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry Shortcake's friends watch her with wide eyes as she everrrrr-so-gently squirts a layer of blueberry smoothie into a tall glass, trying to not disturb the five other multi-colored layers beneath it. It's her tenth attempt to create the world's first Rainbow Smoothie! She has even painted one wall of her café rainbow colors in honor of the soon-to-be new item on the menu. No one dares breathe for fear of spoiling the delicate touch of a master smoothie-squirter at work.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: It's a busy day at Lemon's salon, a charming place that is more than just a hair salon it's one of favorite places for Strawberry and her friends to relax and socialize. All the girls are getting their hair done for the gala grand opening of Mr. Longface's new lawn-bowling and croquet club. They're spirited and laughing and chatting and having a great time, as Lemon runs from one of her friends to the next, doing hair and nails, serving tea and cookies.

programme.desc: The Cutie Map sends Starlight Glimmer and Sunburst to their hometown of Sire's Hollow to solve a problem.

programme.desc: HappyKids

programme.title: Blippi's London Bus Special
programme.desc: Climb inside a double-decker bus and explore the great city of London with Blippi!

programme.title: Snowberry and Seven Berrykins
programme.desc: The Baby Berrykins are enthralled by a fairytale that Blueberry reads to them for Story Time. Charmed by their reaction, Strawberry suggests that the girls do a “berrytale play” for the kids, sort of a “Story Time On Stage.” Plum volunteers to direct it. She envisions a small, simple production—until she hears about a gigantic production of “Snowberry and the Seven Berrykins” that's a smash hit in Berry Big City. She becomes convinced that unless she does the same play in the same grand scale, she'll be the laughing stock of the berry bitty theatrical world! Plum races the play into production.

programme.title: Berryella and Prince Berry Charming
programme.desc: Strawberry and the girls excitedly plan to put on a “Story Time On Stage” musical play for the Berrykin kids: “Berryella and Prince Berry Charming,” directed and choreographed by Plum, with musical direction by Cherry. Strawberry will play Berryella, with Lemon and Blueberry as her comically jealous stepsisters, and costume designer Raspberry as her Fairy Fashionmother. Orange is the stage manager, assisted by stagehands Berrykin Ed and Berrykin Earl. They've barely begun when they face their first problem: the Berrykin who was supposed to play Prince Charming has broken his toe and must bow out of the production!

programme.title: Blippi's Wonderful World Tour
programme.desc: Dance, sing, and learn with Blippi like you've never seen him before and special guest Meekah. Shout out your favorite vehicles, shake out all the wiggles, and OJ Twist your way through this brand-new musical party!

programme.title: Blippi's Big Dino Adventure
programme.desc: Get ready for a fun-filled journey as they search for hidden dinosaur eggs, explore exciting dino habitats, and learn all about different dinosaur species. Along the way, they'll discover fascinating facts, solve puzzles, and have plenty of hands-on fun!

programme.title: The Littlest Berrykin
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, “The Littlest Berrykin,” into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics. But before leaving, they must choose which of their three princesses (played by Lemon, Raspberry and Strawberry in royal gowns) will rule the kingdom.

programme.title: The Berry Big Relay Race
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the “retrieve” part of the activity—as soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search. Orange finds Strawberry, Plum and Raspberry in Lemon's salon, getting their hair and nails done, but something starts going terribly wrong with the appliances.

programme.title: The Broken Wheel
programme.desc: But now the wheel won't spin, and Sid wonders how exactly wheels work? At school, Sid explores how wheels are simple machines that help move all kinds of things like cars, trains, tricycles, and even toy trucks!

Will the friends get their amazing day at the beach after all?

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Thunderbell is sad because he's discovered a new fruit and eaten all of it. Now there's none left and he'll never be able to eat that fruit again. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase and transforms into a farmer. // Thunderbell has a terrible tummy ache. Rainbow Ruby becomes a Microbiologist to find out why Thunderbell is sick. Rainbow Ruby uses a microscope to find a bacterium inside the cheesecake Thunderbell had but Felicia accidentally casts a spell that makes the bacterium gigantic.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling takes Rainbow Ruby to Ellie's cabin where she meets mischievous baby stars that fell from the sky. The baby stars were playing together, got separated from their mother and ended up in Rainbow Village. // Kiki is extremely upset because the jewel Prince Frederick gave her as a gift broke. The friends try to glue the broken pieces together but it doesn't work. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a jewelry designer and tries designing jewelry with the broken pieces.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Ruby's Ranger Adventure // The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: When Ruby and Choco arrive at the village, they find a very worried looking Ling Ling. Gina, Ellie, and Thunderbell went camping in Rainbow Forest but they saw a monster in the forest, got scared and had to run away. // Ruby is struggling to make a doll with her dad. Ruby and Choco get their suitcase and as Ruby swings her umbrella, there they are, in front of Rainbow fountain. Mayor Ling Ling tells her that today is the day of Princess Kiki's ballet performance.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby is looking at shoes that are now too small for her but she is unwilling to throw away. Ling Ling is worried about Thunderbell. It took a long time for the village friends to prepare an amazing painting for the mayor. Unfortunately, Thunderbell accidentally destroyed the painting while delivering it.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: At Your Service // A Hard Rain
programme.desc: There is a new menu at the restaurant, which is very popular. There is a long line in front of the restaurant but there weren't enough staff members to serve the villagers the food. Rainbow Ruby turns into a waitress using her magic suitcase and serve tables kindly. // Rainbow Village is full of marbles. The marbles that Rainbow Ruby spilled in her room poured down into the village from up above the sky! Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to transform into a paramedic.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Behind the Scenes // Paperdoll in Peril
programme.desc: Ling Ling is worried about the play planned for tonight. There are no costumes ready for the villagers so it's hard to figure out which roles they're playing. Rainbow Ruby transforms into a costume designer and designs costumes for her friends. // It is very windy in Rainbow village and Paige, a paper doll, is flying to wherever the wind takes her. She is so light that she is blown away by the wind. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a fire fighter and rescue Paige.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Singing in the Rain // Mail Carrier Mayhem

Rainbow Ruby transforms into a singer. // Ling Ling is worried because of the "Secret Present Swapping Party" that Thunderbell is preparing. Thunderbell forgot to send out the invitations. Rainbow Ruby turns into a mail carrier and delivers the invitations.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Going Golfing // Case of the Stolen Spectacles

programme.desc: Rev and Avery go on an adventure to discover the Crystal Cavern. As they enter the first cave, a swarm of bats scare Rumble so much, he takes off through a maze of tunnels! They can't worry about the Crystal Cavern-they have to find Rumble first! // When Molly tells a campfire story about the Fender Bend Beast, the kids' imaginations run wild. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Camping Trip // Like Father Like Son
programme.desc: Rev can't wait to take Avery camping. But when he learns they're trying a new campsite for the first time ever, he is disappointed-what if the new campsite isn't as fun...or worse...boring?! It's up to Avery to get him excited for a new adventure! // Rev wants to be just like his dad, so he and Rumble attempt Ben and Duke's usual tasks. They're disappointed when they aren't strong enough to tackle the big jobs the way Ben would, but sometimes, a little Rev magic and Rumble power are even better!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Gear Up Grand Prix // Chinese New Year
programme.desc: As the Gear Up Grand Prix begins, each of the friends runs into problems and must drop out of the race. Soon, slow and steady Lori is the only one left standing! Cheered on by her friends, can Lori and Tipper find the confidence to win? // When the gang puts on a Chinese New Year play, they cast Rumble as the monster. He's a natural! But in rehearsal Rumble begins to worry that he'll be too scary for the audience on opening night. Rumble will need his friends to help him find his roar!

programme.title: Dibo The Gift Dragon
programme.desc: Let's Party in Cozy Island!

programme.title: Berry and Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, the little snail boy and Dolly, the ladybird are best friends. Together they discover the world around them, while they make new friends with Balthazar the bee, Flutter the butterfly, Stanley the stag-beetle, Leapy the grasshopper, and many others.

programme.title: Jenny's Magic Shop
programme.desc: Jenny and her best friend Blam the Teddy Bear run a magic shop in the town of Dreamville, where everybody can come for magical help. The residents of Dreamville always leave the shop thanking Jenny, but actually, they set the stage for their own miracles, leaving behind in the shop whatever is keeping them from living life and making decisions. After all, the ability to change yourself is the truest form of magic. Jenny and Blam never refuse to help anyone, but it often happens that they're the ones who need help, since Jenny's still a kid and Blam's an eccentric teddy bear.

programme.title: Doby & Disy: Exploring Journey
programme.desc: Adorable twin brother and sister, Doby & Disy, go on adventures in the magic forest together with their friends. They learn different colors, figures, songs and communication skills by solving various problems on the way.

programme.title: Helper Car
programme.desc: Cartoon for kids about helper cars: a fire truck, an ambulance, a police car and a tow truck. Why these cars and trucks are useful? Because they help people and other cars: fire truck can put out fire, ambulance helps people, when they are hurt or sick, it could drive them to the hospital. Police car patrols the city. Tow truck help other cars, when they are broken down. Watch new car cartoon and learn about helper cars!

programme.title: TurboZaurs
programme.desc: The adventures of dinosaur's squad transforming into big machines who are willing to solve any difficulties that kids may face in their everyday life.

programme.title: Tommy the Little Dragon
programme.desc: Tommy is a soft toy who lives with an ordinary panda family. Panda parents have no idea about him, while their cubs cannot live a day without Tommy! With the help of his magic soap bubbles, Tommy teleports kids to wonderful universes full of adventures, to help them discover a vast and captivating world, fight their fears and inhibitions, and learn important family values.

programme.title: Mya Go
programme.desc: Mya Go is a preschool animated show about a young girl whose enthusiasm infects everyone around her. Set in the bustling town of Everyday, Mya Go lives here with the Go family and lives nearby her closest friends.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Robocar POLI - Try not to hurry & I want to be praised.: School B is late and he is worried about the children who are waiting for him. He looks for the short cut. However every roads are blocked because of roadwork.

programme.title: Princess Play Time
programme.desc: The proud Princess likes to do things her own way, but her antics are always joined by her restless brother, Prince, who tends to turn everything topsy-turvy. Any playtime in their room transforms into a fantastic journey through unusual worlds: the children arrange a picnic on the Moon, conduct a detective investigation in a toy city, or search for pirate treasures on islands! Although initially, the Princess and Prince seem to clash and compete, by the end, they always find joy in each other's company and that of their cherished dog, Bona.

programme.title: Pins and Nettie
programme.desc: Pins and Nettie are besties and there is nothing they like more than going on adventures together, most of time.

programme.title: Super Car
programme.desc: The Super Car Series is a brand-new children's musical animation short film created by the BarryTiger brand, designed to introduce kids to different vehicles. Tailored for preschool children aged 0-8, the series uses an original musical format, allowing kids to learn about various common cars and machinery through engaging songs. Beyond vehicle recognition, it also fosters values of respect, kindness, and teamwork. The story takes place in a town where humans and cars coexist, with fourteen Super Cars working together to protect the city, resolve everyday challenges, and combat disasters caused by villains.

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. From the Amazon jungles to the deepest oceans, and to the hottest deserts, Paula and friends solve problems, have fun and make more friends along the way!

programme.title: The Adventures of Annie & Ben
programme.sub-title: The Adventures of Annie and Ben - Episode 5
programme.desc: Is it a bird? Is it a plane? It's... a UFO! Annie, Ben and Mango encounter an alien in the Nevada desert, who offers to take them to the moon! What gravity-defying adventures await them there? Watch this alien-tastic episode to find out

programme.title: Back to Classics
programme.desc: Every kids loves Head Shoulders Knees and Toes, Old MacDonlad had a Farm & all the nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Here's a collection of gentle melodies featuring Little Boy Blue, Let's go to sleep, and many more.

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Let the babies drift off into a magical slumber with Hush Little Baby, Hey Diddle Diddle and more!

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Soft, comforting lullabies to make bedtime serene and cozy for children.

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Rock your kids to sleep with our carefully curated lullabies featuring Hush Little Baby and more!

programme.title: Sweet Dreams

programme.desc: Mateo and Zoey are captured by the Night Hunter and must free Z-Blob to rescue their friends at Castle Nocturnia from a terrible fate.

programme.desc: The Never Witch's sudden assault forces the dream chasers to split up. While the main team rushes to the mysterious Dunes of Duralumina, Nova and Sneak are left behind to defend.

programme.title: Personal Space Invaders
programme.desc: With the Never Witch on the loose, the dream chasers head to Oz and Albert's landing to use Oz's enchanted telescope. But what should have been?

programme.title: Secret Crush
programme.desc: Aliya and Liann take matters into their own hands as they go undercover to solve the mystery of Ley-La, the secretive and enigmatic figure who's been lurking around the periphery of their lives. Posing as reporters, they dig deep and discover a key clue.

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: Marvel Black Panther Trouble in Wakanda
programme.desc: Being the King of Wakanda is tough -- especially when you're also the Black Panther! When Thanos arrives from outer space and threatens to destroy Earth, the Black Panther leaps into action and defeats him with the help of Earth's Mightiest Heroes. But the situation only gets worse when rogue villains Killmonger and Klaue team up with the Mad Titan to take the fight to Black Panther's homeland! Can the Panther pounce on their perilous plan before Wakanda is pulverized?

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something…one of the Magic Books! It's “The Book of Deception.” They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: The Hundred Year Moon
programme.desc: At the night of the Hundred Year Moon, the Wolves are running wild and causing havoc. Crooler kidnaps a young gorilla girl to lure Laval, Eris and Gorzan the Gorilla out to rescue her. It is a very dangerous night, but finally Skinnet the Skunk's foul odor may prove useful.

programme.title: Fish Story!
programme.desc: Vic and Owen find themselves, along with Sinjin, in the middle of a massive dino-fight in the old Jurassic Park Visitor Center.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When Pronto accidentally uses the Emperor's sword blaster, he can suddenly do no wrong. Lady Dai-Fu manipulates Underlord Holt into trapping the Shane Gang with a new superweapon: the Iron Warrior!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Emperor has returned! After the Shane Gang failed to defeat the Iron Warrior, the Emperor sets to work creating even more Unstoppable Warriors to reclaim the Eastern Caverns. programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Eastern Champion

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang take Tad under their wing, training him to blast like a pro with Eli's old blaster and teaching him to live by the slugslinger's code. Tad takes to it like a natural, and as Kord says, it looks like they have another "slugslinging savant from the Surface" on their hands. But their training will be put to the test when Tad accompanies them to a showdown with the Scrap Force...and the Shadow Clan!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Tad is still missing after the slug-out with the Shadow Clan, but the Gang have to set off without him when reports start coming in of slugs disappearing all across the 99 caverns. As they pursue the trail of missing slugs, the mystery grows darker when it leads them straight to Dr. Blakk's old stronghold!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Tad's hypnotic slug Pieper has gone megamorph, his gang of supporters all have Gattler blasters, and Tad's control over his army of ghouls is stronger than Dr. Blakk's ever was. The Shane Gang are under non-stop ghoul fire as they struggle to put a stop to Tad's plans and end the mass ghouling of slugs once and for all.

programme.title: Slugterra

Eli refuses to let his slug or any other get ghouled, so the team breaks in to Blakk's fortress to free them. While inside, they learn of Blakk's plan to conquer Slugterra.

programme.title: Slugterra

With the help of the invisible narrator, the toys, along with the audience solve different tasks, play and take part in adventures. "Woodventures" is a musical series with lots of songs and dances. programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Marine biologist Danni Washington hosts this series that explains how nature has helped to inspire technology that people use on a daily basis. Some of the nature-inspired innovations include airplanes inspired by birds and helicopters that were influenced by dragonflies. The show also introduces viewers to people involved in creating innovations that are based on animals, including biologists who study the behavior of ants, architects designing "living buildings" and roboticists who are making their designs bigger and stronger based on animals.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Americans have been fascinated by the cosmos for decades and rely on NASA to explore celestial bodies seen in the night sky to get a better idea of what is out there. In this series, former NASA employee Emily Calandrelli visits some of the agency's facilities, private companies and universities to speak with people knowledgeable about the topic to help "show off the coolest aspects of the space industry," to use her words. Technology, a potential manned mission to Mars and planetary tourism are some themes.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.sub-title: Muerte famosa Reclamando a mi hija
programme.desc: Carlos es un Vlogger muy conocido y con muchos seguidores, pero sus últimos videos han desatado una polémica muy seria. El chico ha mostrado imágenes de jóvenes que se acaban de suicidar y que dañan la sensibilidad de sus familiares. Cinthia perdió la custodia de su hija por tráfico de drogas y ahora, que supuestamente está limpia y libre de cargos, quiere recuperarla, pero Alexander que es el padre biológico no quiere entregar a la niña.

programme.title: Caso cerrado

programme.title: Destilando amor
programme.desc: Se lleva a cabo la lectura del testamento de don Amador dejando una cláusula especial para Rodrigo y Aarón. La fuerte atracción entre Rodrigo y Gaviota continúa creciendo y comienzan a formar un lazo especial.

programme.title: Fuego en la sangre
programme.desc: Pablito descubre a Ricardo en la hacienda robando. El Coyote le ofrece su casa a Raquel para llevar a cabo sus planes y poder destruir a Ricardo. Fernando obliga a Ruth a firmar un documento en donde le hereda la hacienda.

programme.title: Fuego en la sangre
programme.desc: Óscar enfurece al ver que no puede caminar. Ricardo le confiesa a Ruth que Gabriela es su verdadera madre. Juan salva a Gabriela al ver que su camioneta no tiene frenos.

programme.title: Fuego en la sangre
programme.desc: Juan planea hacer que Sofía se case con él lo más pronto posible. Gabriela le pide a Ruth que no le confiese a Sofía que ella no es su hija. A Sofía se le rompe el corazón al saber que Gabriela jamás la ha querido.

programme.title: Fuego en la sangre
programme.desc: Jimena enfurece al ver a Ruth con Juan. Juan le pide a Sofía que sea su esposa de una manera muy especial. Jimena decide separarse de Óscar al ver que él la desprecia.

programme.title: Destilando amor
programme.desc: Rodrigo sale de la cárcel y descubre que su abuela se está recuperando de la embolia cerebral. Román es mordido por una serpiente. Rodrigo se reúne con Aarón en la cárcel antes de su ejecución. Gaviota decide no hablar con Rodrigo.

programme.title: Destilando amor
programme.desc: Gaviota rechaza a Rodrigo, pero Alonso le confiesa la verdad de lo que sucedió antes de su viaje a Londres. Gaviota regresa a la hacienda para buscar a Rodrigo y casarse con él.

programme.title: La Inocente
programme.desc: La historia de una mujer con problemas mentales que tiene que enfrentar un embarazo.

programme.title: Uno y medio contra el mundo
programme.desc: En una agradable amistad entre un hombre despreocupado y un muchachito, surge una extraña sorpresa.

programme.title: El increíble profesor Zovek
programme.desc: El profesor Sovek se enfrenta a un doctor que puede controlar las mentes humanas y quiere apoderarse del planeta.

programme.title: El mundo loco de los jóvenes
programme.desc: Cuatro jóvenes intentan conquistar a la nueva vecina pero al fracasar recurren a un cantante y ella se enamora de él.

programme.title: Salón Mexico
programme.desc: Mercedes trabaja como cabaretera para costear los estudios de su hermana. Los problemas comienzan cuando Mercedes y Paco, su explotador, ganan un concurso de danza, pero él se niega a compartir el premio con ella.

programme.title: Cortesana
programme.desc: Una joven es seducida por el marido de su prima cuando la pareja llega a su casa durante una gira del pianista.
